6.eng-name: The Book of the Times (of Prayer)

hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Aishah that the Prophet (ﷺ) said:"Whoever catches up with a Rak'ah of Fajr before the sun rises, then he has caught up with it; and whoever catches up with a Rak'ah of 'Asr before the sun sets, then he has caught up with it

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ أَدْرَكَ رَكْعَةً مِنْ صَلاَةِ الصُّبْحِ
chapter.eng-name: Whoever Catches Up With A Rak'ah Of The Subh Prayer
